SIC http://$doregex[ip]$doregex[m3u8]
ip redirect=(.*) http://www.liveflashpublisher.com:1935/loadbalancer
m3u8 ea \+ "(.*?)" http://www.liveflashplayer.net/membedplayer/SIC7483874/1/565/440 Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; U; CPU iPhone OS 4_2_1 like Mac OS X; en-us) AppleWebKit/533.17.9 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.0.2 Mobile/8C148 Safari/6533.18.5 http://www.liveflashplayer.net
A SIC e um canal generalista com programas de informacao, entretenimento, documentarios e programas de ficcao, falados em Portugues. https://raw.githubusercontent.com/marcojoao/IPTV_Logos/master/sic.png
TVI
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/marcojoao/IPTV_Logos/master/tvi.png http://video-live.iol.pt:1935/live_tvi/smil:LIVE_TVI/chunklist_b814000.m3u8 A TVI apresenta conteudos com base em producao nacional, sustentada sobretudo em ficcao (novelas e series), entretenimento, generos complementados com o desporto e programacao internacional, baseada em grande cinema e series de referencia.

BT SPORTS 3 $doregex[getUrl]
getUrl #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import requests, re link = re.findall('src="(.*/channel.php.*?)"', page_data)[0].replace('channel','embed') headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/54.0.2840.99 Safari/537.36', 'Referer':'http://castfree.me/ace/uk/bteurope.php'} source= requests.get(link, headers = headers) vars = re.search(r"var name.+?'(.*?)'.*\s.*edgeserverip.+?'(.*?)'.*\s.*appName.+?'(.*?)'", source.text) token = re.findall('"(\.m3u8[^"]+)"', source.text)[0] return 'http://' + vars.group(2) + '/' + vars.group(3) + '/' + vars.group(1) + token + '|Referer=http://castfree.me/ace/uk/bteurope.php'
http://castfree.me/ace/uk/bteurope.php
